content:
I bought this phone recently . I am wiritng my feedback after using for 7 days. My main use for the phone is camera and normal usages.

Pro: Good camera in this price segment .
Light wieght and sleek design
good user interface

Con: No WoFI calling
No NFC
NO IR
LTE only Cat 6 supported which means highest downloading speed can be 300 Mbps. Compittiors phone have Cat 20 LTE supported in the same price segment.
